location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Our neighbourhood is considered Connaught or the Beltline area. Connaught being the community and the Beltline being the general area. The Beltline area is basically a rectangle. A few blocks north is downtown, a few blocks south is 17th ave which is where a lot of the bars and pubs are. To the east you have the Stampede grounds and the confluence of our two beautiful rivers. Our location is as central as you can get in Calgary!

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: For longer distances (elbow river, river walk, east village, eau claire market) we would recommend taking an e-scooter to get there.There is also lots of public transportation nearby - including the c-train on 7th avenue.We would recommend Uber to get to and from the airport as well.

reviews_details.host_response:
Thank you for acknowledging our quick response and willingness to assist. However, your review overstates the issues.
The home was professionally cleaned before check-in, and there is no cleaning fee to stay at our place - likely a large factor in your decision to book here. You noted a minor stain, which we immediately addressed, and we offered to reclean any areas of concern. Every request was handled promptly and respectfully.
Citing dust on a bathroom ceiling fan‚Äîan out-of-reach fixture not typically inspected daily‚Äîas a sign of poor cleanliness is simply unreasonable. We welcome fair, constructive feedback, but we also stand by the quality and service that so many guests consistently recognize.
We encourage future guests to approach stays with reasonable expectations and to review our many positive ratings for a more accurate picture of the experience.

When we unplugged the modem to plug it directly into our laptop we were immediately messaged to plug it back in and it made us feel extremely uncomfortable.

This was a fantastic stay! Our hosts, Richard and Teresa, were incredibly welcoming and made us feel right at home. The room was very comfortable and clean, with all the necessary amenities. A particular highlight was the stunning city view from the property. It was breathtaking both during the day and at night. Highly recommended!

Richard & Teresa‚Äôs Airbnb was absolutely perfect for our trip. It is located in a prime location with many restaurants, coffee shops, bakeries and a food hall right across the street. We enjoyed being able to walk across the street and enjoy a meal or pickup a coffee. This unit has the most amazing view of the Calgary skyline that lit up at night. The unit was cozy, clean and set up very intentionally to ensure that guests have everything they need. They included multiple amenities from the in unit laundry to the complimentary snacks and drinks. We were very pleased with the space as well as the underground parking. We would definitely recommend this place to others and would definitely stay again :)

I had a truly wonderful stay! The host was incredibly friendly and attentive, making me feel right at home. There was an abundance of activities to enjoy, ensuring that my time there was both relaxing and engaging.

We had a wonderful time. Richard and Teresa made our day when they left a thoughtful gift since it was my husband's birthday when we checked in. They communicated well and were helpful throughout our stay.

The beds and pillows were so comfortable. We just all in all had a great stay. The view and the lights at night are absolutely beautiful!

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: Colours is situated on the edge of both Victoria Park and in the Beltline.Victoria Park is an up-and-coming area, with converted warehouses on 1st Street SW, now home to cool clothes designers and offbeat home decor shops. Eateries include casual cafes, laid-back global spots and Jewish delis, while bars and small music venues get lively after dark. The Saddledome arena hosts concerts and Calgary Flames hockey games, and the annual Calgary Stampede rodeo takes place at Stampede Park.The hip Beltline area is bounded by 17th Avenue SW, with cool boutiques selling fashion, retro furniture, vinyl and quirky gifts. Dining spans trendy taco joints, locavore eateries and Korean restaurants, while nightlife encompasses craft beer pubs, live music venues and dance clubs. There are landscaped gardens at Central Memorial Park.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: City transit (C-Train and bus) are available and stops are conveniently located nearby. Taxis, Ubers, bike and scooter rentals are also options. You'll find that you'll be able to walk to many of the local amenities. There are so many convenient restaurants, pubs, stores and things to do in close proximity.We have one reserved parkade spot included in your stay but if you have visitors, paid street parking is available.

reviews_details.review: Beautiful apartment with a great location but there is a lot of monitoring. We were told about the door cam watching for ‚Äúextra guests‚Äù but there‚Äôs also sound detector inside the apartment and it felt like we were being watched. When we unplugged the modem to plug it directly into our laptop we were immediately messaged to plug it back in and it made us feel extremely uncomfortable.
reviews_details.host_response:
We‚Äôre glad you appreciated the apartment and location. We‚Äôre disappointed, however, by the misrepresentation of your experience.
All security devices ‚Äî a doorbell camera at the entrance and a sound-level monitor inside ‚Äî are clearly disclosed in our listing and house rules. These are standard and only monitor what‚Äôs allowed by Airbnb to ensure safety, prevent parties, and protect our neighbours‚Äô peace.
You did not unplug the internet modem (which remains in plain view by the TV), but rather a concealed smart lock/camera hub inside an electrical panel at the back of a closet, which disabled our entry security ‚Äî a serious rules violation. This, along with repeated noise disturbances and disrespectful conduct caught on camera after reminders, is why we reached out during your stay.
We take guest comfort seriously, but also have a duty to maintain a safe and respectful environment for everyone.

reviews_details.review: This was a fantastic stay! Our hosts, Richard and Teresa, were incredibly welcoming and made us feel right at home. The room was very comfortable and clean, with all the necessary amenities. A particular highlight was the stunning city view from the property. It was breathtaking both during the day and at night. Highly recommended!

Richard & Teresa‚Äôs Airbnb was absolutely perfect for our trip. It is located in a prime location with many restaurants, coffee shops, bakeries and a food hall right across the street. We enjoyed being able to walk across the street and enjoy a meal or pickup a coffee. This unit has the most amazing view of the Calgary skyline that lit up at night. The unit was cozy, clean and set up very intentionally to ensure that guests have everything they need. They included multiple amenities from the in unit laundry to the complimentary snacks and drinks. We were very pleased with the space as well as the underground parking. We would definitely recommend this place to others and would definitely stay again :)
reviews_details.host_response: We‚Äôre so glad you enjoyed the central location, skyline views, and thoughtful amenities. Guests also appreciate the convenience of included underground parking. We‚Äôd be happy to welcome you back anytime!

reviews_details.review: I had a truly wonderful stay! The host was incredibly friendly and attentive, making me feel right at home. There was an abundance of activities to enjoy, ensuring that my time there was both relaxing and engaging.

We had a wonderful time. Richard and Teresa made our day when they left a thoughtful gift since it was my husband's birthday when we checked in. They communicated well and were helpful throughout our stay.

Richard & Teresa‚Äôs place was clean, comfortable and very cozy. We got in late in which I really appreciate them understanding. We were welcomed with complimentary snacks which were very handy. It was nice to have coffee and creamer at the airbnb. There were also a few other things I noticed that would be handy if a person stayed longer; spices, cooking oil and vinaigrettes. The beds and pillows were so comfortable. We just all in all had a great stay. The view and the lights at night are absolutely beautiful!
Was an amazing stay in this lovely appartement with this unique amazing view over Calgary downtown. Will ever come back next time I‚Äòim in Calgary. Thanks a lot for this opportunity.
The place is in a great location, endless dinning options. We loved the view. The detailed check in instructions were perfect. We would stay again.
Amazing stay here would definitely recommend to others and would love to stay here again! Super walkable to Everything downtown!! Awesome to relax on the belcony too

I stayed at this Airbnb in Calgary for six nights, and it was a fantastic experience! The place was clean, tidy, and very comfortable. It was also well-equipped with everything I needed for my stay. The host was incredibly friendly and welcoming, which made the experience even better. The views were amazing, making my time there truly enjoyable. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great stay in Calgary!

Absolutely Loved my two week stay.  So many close restaurants, definitely try Native Tongues for Mexican and Actually Pretty Good for Pizza (First Street Market).  The views, in the evening, from the Airbnb are gorgeous.  The bed is super comfy with lots of pillow options.  The couch is cozy to tuck in and relax.  Overall, 10/10 and will definitely be booking again
Was a really beautiful place in such a good location with lots of restaurants, bars and stores nearby.
Great place to stay with our 10 month old. Easy check in & close to many amenities. Thanks Richard & Teresa!
They were great! Made accommodations though our flight got in late and the instructions and check in was seamless. Also beautiful view and close to lots with great walking distance to lots

Top notch location, views and comfort.
We are locals and needed a place while we had some home renovations, the beltline is one of the bast locations in the city. Great food and entertainment right outside your door and you can‚Äôt beat the skyline view and sunrise from this corner apartment.
The couch and beds were comfortable, stocked with most things you‚Äôd need during a visit. The hosts were very responsive and accommodating.
Absolutely recommend staying here.
Such a beautiful bnb. The views were breathtaking üòç. Richard and Teresa were great hosts and were very communicative. Would definitely choose to stay here again and recommend it to others as well.
Awesome Spot! beautiful views and lots of great restaurants downstairs
Perfect location, stunning views, and beautiful decor. The place was very well stocked with plenty of dishes and utensils. Exceeded our expectations!

Richard is a fantastic host
Great location surrounded by resturants
The rooms view was amazing
10/10 will be booking again
Would stay here again in a heartbeat!  The view was INCREDIBLE!  The city lights at night were fabulous!

Richard and Teresa are exactly what Air BnB hosts should be -- responsive, professional, kind, and go the extra mile to provide lovely touches such as welcome snacks, coffee and tea stocks, and kitchen basics like oil and spices.
We were so fortunate to find this AirBnB, and we would book again unreservedly. Richard and Teresa were extremely kind hosts, and very generous with our Christmas Day checkout.
The unit itself is exactly like the photos and as described. The views are absolutely amazing, and it is both relaxing and awe-inspiring to just sit and look at the city lights in the evening. The decor is top notch, and well thought out. Homey touches such as curated DVDs, games, and books make this a true city retreat.
Having underground parking and an elevator made it accessible to people with more limited mobility, and was super important to us.
This was the perfect location for our last minute visit, and we felt so kindly accommodated by Richard and Teresa. Thank you again
Excellent cozy place in Calgary with amazing skyline views. Great location and very comfortable. Communicative and helpful hosts. Highly recommended!
Amazing views !
Was a very nice place to stay and host was great with instructions and replying.

Located 2 blocks from 4th St SW and all its bars, restaurants and shops, you are also minutes from the Saddledome, 17th Ave SW as well as the Stampede Grounds. Facing north, this unit is a perfect getaway. It's quiet, has river sounds and private riverfront access. reviews:
Definite pro‚Äôs
Aaron was responsive, reasonable and went out his way to accommodate me during emergencies.
Location was excellent, walking distance to restaurants, parks and walking trails. The unit itself was great, well equipped and comfortable. (Sofa needs changing).
Con‚Äôs
Since this is a property managed Airbnb, the only minor issue was, having a single point of contact as a host. ‚ÄúCall host‚Äù typically directed you to an answering service and ultimately to the host - a new experience for me staying Airbnb‚Äôs.
Excellent and beautifully located unit. We enjoyed our stay a lot! I recommend this place, close to the river and close to grocery shops, pharmacies, restaurants, etc!
Loved the stay. Great to be around the heart of mission with the river and the restaurants it offered

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Aaron's place. The place is clean, great furniture, nice rooms, great kitchen, and an excellent place to sit and work with a nice desk setup. I also walked into the city regularly, to work at coffee shops. The walk is only ~15-20 minutes, which is also pleasant to get fresh air and see the city. The local area of Mission is also enjoyable if you want some food or a smaller coffee shop.
The building and property are also beautiful, but the apartment I stayed in (202) is on the non-river side. I think the listing photo is a little misleading, as it showcases the river photo first, but this is not your experience in this apartment. Your keys get you access to this back area with the river, but only the grass and some used dirty lawn furniture. If you are renting this apartment for that beautiful view and outdoor experience, you are not going to get it.
Still worth the stay, if you want a beautiful apartment and a well-organised AirBnB experience!
Small, cozy space. Convenient and great location!

This place was great! Theres a lot of great restaurants nearby and its in a quiet neighborhood. Would definitely stay again. Only issue I came across was the parking. I could not access the garage and unfortunately the issue was not resolved during my stay. It made things a bit inconvenient as I had to find street parking and then walk to the apartment. But again other than that it was nice :)

This place was great for our few days in Calgary at the stampede. It was walking distance max 15min walk to the stampede and very close to excellent breakfast joints and other restaurants. The place was spacious for a one bedroom and we had an additional person sleep on the couch (not a pull out). Aaron was very responsive and quick to respond when a few items (extra towel and linens) were missing from the place. We would recommend to others!

My partner and I visited Calgary for a short few days, and we had a great stay at Aaron's apartment. It is a great apartment with everything we need. The location is great, easy to walk to public transit. And there are lots of good restaurants blocks away. Aaron gives clear instructions, and the communication we had was friendly and straightforward.

This is a great place to stay! Super central in the best neighbourhood with restaurants, bars, and shops in walking distance. Right next to river, which was an amazing place to walk in the heat wave. The place was clean and stylish. Bed was comfortable. Would absolutely stay again next time in Calgary!

Aaron‚Äôs place was great. It had everything you needed in the kitchen, laundry and bathroom (along with travel skin care samples). The condo also had a nice back yard with lawn chairs right by the Elbow river. It was a great place to hang out with our Golden.  Thanks Aaron!

We loved our stay at Aaron's place and will definitely be back! Aaron was a great, responsive host and his thorough instructions were both super helpful and appreciated. Aaron's place is in a beautiful area - we felt super safe and right at home. The apartment was super clean and comfortable. Super close to restaurants and there's the river right out back and a nice park right down the road. We really enjoyed the centrality of Aaron's place - everywhere we visited was a short drive away. Overall, great place and great host!
We loved Aaron‚Äôs place! He was very communicative and very kind. We loved the neighborhood and thought the Airbnb itself was meticulously, cleaned and offered a cozy experience!
Lovely place to stay, close to restaurants, stores, mall and train station. Would definitely stay again.
Place was clean and host had awesome communication. They gave lots of ideas and had easy to follow check in.
Aaron was a great host and very responsive when it came to reaching out. The place was in a nice area, close to the downtown area that is lively and free spirited.
The place was very clean and beautiful. The kitchen was modern and there was a lot of natural light. Would definitely recommend it!
Loved my stay here. It was in a great location and felt like home! Will be staying here again. Thanks Aaron!
Extremely pleased, everything was as it was described. Aaron was very forward with information & would stay again for sure.
Great place to stay!! Kitchen was equipped enough to cook a great meal, super clean, and Aaron was easy to reach
Beautiful and bright place. Very clean. Great location. Will definitely stay again.
Amazing location! Close to a lot of stores and restaurants. Very accommodating host!
Ths was a great Airbnb.  It was comfortable spotless and in a great location.
the stay was amazing, everything was clean

Wonderful apartment, super clean, very stylish and the perfect location to Missions trendy neighbourhood. Walking distance to many great coffee shops and restaurants. Comfortable bed, heated floors and the well stocked kitchen were just a few things I loved. Lots of great sunlight in the suite too! Aaron was a great host and I would highly recommend it!

description: Experience exceptional urban living in this stunning high-floor corner unit, featuring a 1-bedroom + den layout. This meticulously designed condo offers unparalleled views and a warm, inviting atmosphere, ideally situated in the heart of downtown Calgary‚Äôs dynamic scene. Surrounded by premier restaurants, trendy shops, and vibrant entertainment options, you‚Äôll be perfectly positioned to immerse yourself in the best the city has to offer.The spaceProperty Highlights:Seasonal Outdoor Pool: Refresh and unwind in the heated outdoor pool during the warmer months.Modern Fitness Center: Stay fit and healthy with our state-of-the-art gym facilities.Parking: Enjoy the convenience of one dedicated heated underground parking spot.Location Perks:Beltline District: Centrally located near a plethora of attractions.Walking Distance to:Stephen AvenueTD Core Shopping MallCalgary StampedeCalgary Flames - Saddledome17th Avenue (Red Mile)...and many more local highlights!Condo Unit Features:Private One-Bedroom + Den Condo: Spacious and well-appointed with a king bed, a queen Murphy/Wall bed, and a pullout couch to accommodate various needs.Modern Kitchen: Equipped with high-end appliances as well as an Nespresso coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans, utensils and all necessary items for preparing meals at home.Private Balcony: Enjoy panoramic views of the mountains to the west and downtown Calgary.Fitness Equipment: Yoga mat and small weights available in-suite for your convenienceAir Conditioning: Ensure comfort on warmer days.In-Suite Washer/Dryer: Provides the convenience of home for extended stays.High-Speed WiFi: Stay connected with reliable, fast internet.Smart 4K TV: 65‚Äù Smart TV with access to NETFLIX, Amazon Prime Video, Sportsnet, TSN, and select local channels.Mountain and City Views: Delight in stunning views from your corner unit floor to ceiling windows and private balcony.Automation: Blackout blinds will open and close automatically with the click of a button.Premier Host Support: Our team is available around the clock for assistance via the booking platform app, text, or phone.Additional Notes:Shared Amenities: Access to the gym and seasonal outdoor pool may be subject to maintenance or seasonal schedules. Please be aware that no refunds are provided based on amenity availability.Transportation: Enjoy convenient options including:WalkingC-Train+15 Walkway (just 2 blocks away)CabsUberTuroElectric scooters in the summer.For those with a car, one dedicated parking spot is provided.We look forward to making your stay exceptional‚Äîwelcome to your home away from home!Other things to noteThe condominium offers a distinctive retreat, distinguished by its exceptional blend of comfort, style, and meticulous design. This property stands out in the short-term rental market due to the careful attention to detail that sets it apart from the ordinary.The interior of our condo features a sophisticated design that seamlessly integrates modern aesthetics with the functional convince of sleeping 6 comfortably. Each piece of furniture, color scheme, and design element has been thoughtfully selected to create a welcoming and harmonious atmosphere. Our focus is not only on luxury but on delivering an experience that feels like a true home away from home.Additionally, the condo is equipped with cutting-edge amenities designed to meet the needs of today‚Äôs discerning travelers. From advanced technology and high-end appliances to thoughtful touches that enhance convenience, we offer an experience that goes above and beyond expectations.Ultimately, our commitment is to offer more than just a place to stay‚Äîwe aim to create unforgettable experiences. Our condo is designed to be the perfect setting for memorable moments during your visit.Registration DetailsBL283210
reviews: Had a great stay at Clint and Diana‚Äôs place for a girls weekend. It was the perfect size for four girls and very close to many bars in the city. Having a parking spot for this area of the city is also a great benefit. Clint and Diana were also very responsive as hosts. Would definitely recommend/stay here again.

So, Clint and Diana were very nice and super responsive, the place was clean and nothing was broken.
However, there wasn‚Äôt enough toilet paper or paper towels, No BBQ utensils, and only one key to get in and out of the building.
Lastly the pool was completely misleading.
Super small, and didn‚Äôt get really any sun.

Very clear videos on how check In and anything you may need help with during your stay. The apartment was beautiful and very comfortable. Quality furniture and linens. The building itself felt secure and safe. The pool was great for the kids to swim. Overall very happy with our stay, only downside was that the parking space is VERY tight for any larger vehicles .. we have a Toyota sienna van and ended up paying for parking at the Impark parking lot just across the street (no biggie it was very close) but just a heads up to anyone with a larger vehicle it might not fit.

Perfect stay complete with stunning views, ultra luxurious decor, quiet and secure building, access to a heated pool and fitness room, full kitchen and laundry, and walkable to all downtown attractions and activities! From the moment we booked, Clint and Diana were warm and welcoming, quick to respond, flexible, and ensured we had everything we need. We can‚Äôt wait to come back and stay here again! ‚ù§Ô∏è

If all AirBnBs were this clean, cozy and easy to navigate as a rental there would be no place for hotels ever again. Great hosts, that were quick to respond and offered suggestions regarding local amenities, as I wasn‚Äôt familiar with the city. Beautiful space! Bedding is a huge deal for me and everything was top notch quality and comfort. I couldn‚Äôt be happier.

Clint and Diana‚Äôs place is perfect for a stay in downtown Calgary. They are both really great to work with, they made check in seamless and had some really helpful videos to walk you through the process. Their apartment is gorgeous and well appointed with everything one would need for an evening dining in. I highly recommend their place for a stay In Calgary

Clint and Diana were very helpful, the check-in instructions even involved videos which I appreciated. The condo is bright and cheerful with beautiful views of Calgary and the mountains in the distance. We didn‚Äôt have any trouble getting to where we needed to go, it‚Äôs really central.
The kitchen is well equipped, the couch is per for looking out at the city with a beverage and the balcony is a really nice place to relax. The beds are comfortable, the sheets are soft and the pillows were not too hard or too soft.
All around a very enjoyable visit.

This downtown location is hard to beat and being on the 17th floor you get views of the mountains in the distance from the balcony. it was so nice to have a balcony with a bbq to use in the evening for cooking super as well as the two chairs provided on the balcony as well.

Great location, walkable, close to public transport, market and good restaurants. Recommended for travelers who like to explore‚Ä¶Great views to the west, secure building with amenities listed; would return on another visit to Calgary!

We had a great stay  and would have been happy to  stay longer. Clean bright stylish accommodation with all the facilities we could need. Good city views.   Communication was great and all the instructions were very clear. Good location and plenty of eating places nearby plus a good size supermarket Parking space included and was a good size. If you need parking for a large truck there areseveral parking lots nearby. We would have no hesitation at staying again.

Great cozy little condo that is well maintained and super functional.  Comfy beds and well stocked. Super building security. Walkable to 17th and downtown. Clint was very responsive and accommodating!  Didn‚Äôt have chance to try pool but it looked good.  Would definitely stay again.
The condo was the perfect location for everything we needed downtown. It was well taken care of, clean, and relaxing. Check in and out process was very clear and easy. We would stay again.

When we arrived at this Airbnb it smelled strongly of cigarette smoke. I contacted the hosts and while they said they could not smell any cigarette smoke, they were very responsive bringing us an air purifier. While I did appreciate they tried to remedy the situation and left some chocolates the place still smelled smokey for our stay.
The apartment was clean, had great views, coffee and a well stocked kitchen but it was very tight for three women. The sofa bed was very hard, and there were no sheets for it. There were some pillows in the closet but there were no pillowcases. So instead of each of us being able to have her own sleeping space we had to double up and share a bed which was not preferable.
The listing stated there is body soap and a bidet but there was not. I think this place has potential but it needs to be accurately listed and guests should set their expectations for a small place that would be good for two adults and maybe some small children.
We enjoyed our stay.  Super quiet and comfortable.  Great location.
It was a great location for downtown Calgary. Also, the bed was sooooo comfy!
Enjoyed our stay, beautiful condo; lots of natural lighting and more.
One of the best experience we had with Airbnb ever very kind people and the place is awesome
Convenient location! The place was clean. The kitchen was well stocked. The expectations for check out cleaning was difficult as there was not cleaning products.
Clint and Diana were wonderful hosts and we loved being close to excellent restaurants and shopping. Thank you!
Very clear guide lines! Absolutely loved the stay at their gorgeous condo. Clint was very responsive and even tried to get us an early checkin. Highly recommend!
If I come back to Calgary, I will definitely book same place
Very nice apartment with a great view of the city. We will stay there again next time
Great location. Clean comfortable space!
Great hosts. The detailed instructions were very helpful.

listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

description_by_sections.value: Experience exceptional urban living in this stunning high-floor corner unit, featuring a 1-bedroom + den layout. This meticulously designed condo offers unparalleled views and a warm, inviting atmosphere, ideally situated in the heart of downtown Calgary‚Äôs dynamic scene. Surrounded by premier restaurants, trendy shops, and vibrant entertainment options, you‚Äôll be perfectly positioned to immerse yourself in the best the city has to offer.

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: Property Highlights:Seasonal Outdoor Pool: Refresh and unwind in the heated outdoor pool during the warmer months.Modern Fitness Center: Stay fit and healthy with our state-of-the-art gym facilities.Parking: Enjoy the convenience of one dedicated heated underground parking spot.Location Perks:Beltline District: Centrally located near a plethora of attractions.Walking Distance to:Stephen AvenueTD Core Shopping MallCalgary StampedeCalgary Flames - Saddledome17th Avenue (Red Mile)...and many more local highlights!Condo Unit Features:Private One-Bedroom + Den Condo: Spacious and well-appointed with a king bed, a queen Murphy/Wall bed, and a pullout couch to accommodate various needs.Modern Kitchen: Equipped with high-end appliances as well as an Nespresso coffee maker, toaster, pots, pans, utensils and all necessary items for preparing meals at home.Private Balcony: Enjoy panoramic views of the mountains to the west and downtown Calgary.Fitness Equipment: Yoga mat and small weights available in-suite for your convenienceAir Conditioning: Ensure comfort on warmer days.In-Suite Washer/Dryer: Provides the convenience of home for extended stays.High-Speed WiFi: Stay connected with reliable, fast internet.Smart 4K TV: 65‚Äù Smart TV with access to NETFLIX, Amazon Prime Video, Sportsnet, TSN, and select local channels.Mountain and City Views: Delight in stunning views from your corner unit floor to ceiling windows and private balcony.Automation: Blackout blinds will open and close automatically with the click of a button.Premier Host Support: Our team is available around the clock for assistance via the booking platform app, text, or phone.Additional Notes:Shared Amenities: Access to the gym and seasonal outdoor pool may be subject to maintenance or seasonal schedules. Please be aware that no refunds are provided based on amenity availability.Transportation: Enjoy convenient options including:WalkingC-Train+15 Walkway (just 2 blocks away)CabsUberTuroElectric scooters in the summer.For those with a car, one dedicated parking spot is provided.We look forward to making your stay exceptional‚Äîwelcome to your home away from home!

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: The condominium offers a distinctive retreat, distinguished by its exceptional blend of comfort, style, and meticulous design. This property stands out in the short-term rental market due to the careful attention to detail that sets it apart from the ordinary.The interior of our condo features a sophisticated design that seamlessly integrates modern aesthetics with the functional convince of sleeping 6 comfortably. Each piece of furniture, color scheme, and design element has been thoughtfully selected to create a welcoming and harmonious atmosphere. Our focus is not only on luxury but on delivering an experience that feels like a true home away from home.Additionally, the condo is equipped with cutting-edge amenities designed to meet the needs of today‚Äôs discerning travelers. From advanced technology and high-end appliances to thoughtful touches that enhance convenience, we offer an experience that goes above and beyond expectations.Ultimately, our commitment is to offer more than just a place to stay‚Äîwe aim to create unforgettable experiences. Our condo is designed to be the perfect setting for memorable moments during your visit.

reviews_details.review: Had a great stay at Clint and Diana‚Äôs place for a girls weekend. It was the perfect size for four girls and very close to many bars in the city. Having a parking spot for this area of the city is also a great benefit. Clint and Diana were also very responsive as hosts. Would definitely recommend/stay here again.

So, Clint and Diana were very nice and super responsive, the place was clean and nothing was broken.
However, there wasn‚Äôt enough toilet paper or paper towels, No BBQ utensils, and only one key to get in and out of the building.
Lastly the pool was completely misleading.
Super small, and didn‚Äôt get really any sun.
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre glad you enjoyed your stay and found us to be communicative. To clarify, guests are provided with two access devices, as the parkade remote also works for building entry in addition to the fob, apologies if that wasn‚Äôt clear. We‚Äôll also ensure BBQ utensils, paper towels, and toilet paper are fully replenished, as we pride ourselves on keeping the unit well stocked. The pool size and layout are shown in our photos, though we understand it may have felt different in person. We‚Äôre not sure the times you were at the pool; however, the deck typically enjoys sun until mid- afternoon. We always want our guests to feel comfortable & at home, and we‚Äôre happy to keep making each stay even better than the last. Take good care and we welcome you back anytime.

reviews_details.review: Very clear videos on how check In and anything you may need help with during your stay. The apartment was beautiful and very comfortable. Quality furniture and linens. The building itself felt secure and safe. The pool was great for the kids to swim. Overall very happy with our stay, only downside was that the parking space is VERY tight for any larger vehicles .. we have a Toyota sienna van and ended up paying for parking at the Impark parking lot just across the street (no biggie it was very close) but just a heads up to anyone with a larger vehicle it might not fit.
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you so much for your kind note! We‚Äôre so glad you found the check-in easy, the unit comfortable. The pool fun is always a hit with the kids. We appreciate your note about the parking space - vans & larger vehicles can be a tighter fit, and your tip will be helpful for future guests. We‚Äôre happy the nearby lot worked out conveniently.  We‚Äôd love to welcome you back anytime!

reviews_details.review: Perfect stay complete with stunning views, ultra luxurious decor, quiet and secure building, access to a heated pool and fitness room, full kitchen and laundry, and walkable to all downtown attractions and activities! From the moment we booked, Clint and Diana were warm and welcoming, quick to respond, flexible, and ensured we had everything we need. We can‚Äôt wait to come back and stay here again! ‚ù§Ô∏è

If all AirBnBs were this clean, cozy and easy to navigate as a rental there would be no place for hotels ever again. Great hosts, that were quick to respond and offered suggestions regarding local amenities, as I wasn‚Äôt familiar with the city. Beautiful space! Bedding is a huge deal for me and everything was top notch quality and comfort. I couldn‚Äôt be happier.

Clint and Diana‚Äôs place is perfect for a stay in downtown Calgary. They are both really great to work with, they made check in seamless and had some really helpful videos to walk you through the process. Their apartment is gorgeous and well appointed with everything one would need for an evening dining in. I highly recommend their place for a stay In Calgary

Clint and Diana were very helpful, the check-in instructions even involved videos which I appreciated. The condo is bright and cheerful with beautiful views of Calgary and the mountains in the distance. We didn‚Äôt have any trouble getting to where we needed to go, it‚Äôs really central.
The kitchen is well equipped, the couch is per for looking out at the city with a beverage and the balcony is a really nice place to relax. The beds are comfortable, the sheets are soft and the pillows were not too hard or too soft.
All around a very enjoyable visit.

This downtown location is hard to beat and being on the 17th floor you get views of the mountains in the distance from the balcony. it was so nice to have a balcony with a bbq to use in the evening for cooking super as well as the two chairs provided on the balcony as well.

Great location, walkable, close to public transport, market and good restaurants. Recommended for travelers who like to explore‚Ä¶Great views to the west, secure building with amenities listed; would return on another visit to Calgary!

We had a great stay  and would have been happy to  stay longer. Clean bright stylish accommodation with all the facilities we could need. Good city views.   Communication was great and all the instructions were very clear. Good location and plenty of eating places nearby plus a good size supermarket Parking space included and was a good size. If you need parking for a large truck there areseveral parking lots nearby. We would have no hesitation at staying again.

Great cozy little condo that is well maintained and super functional.  Comfy beds and well stocked. Super building security. Walkable to 17th and downtown. Clint was very responsive and accommodating!  Didn‚Äôt have chance to try pool but it looked good.  Would definitely stay again.
The condo was the perfect location for everything we needed downtown. It was well taken care of, clean, and relaxing. Check in and out process was very clear and easy. We would stay again.

When we arrived at this Airbnb it smelled strongly of cigarette smoke. I contacted the hosts and while they said they could not smell any cigarette smoke, they were very responsive bringing us an air purifier. While I did appreciate they tried to remedy the situation and left some chocolates the place still smelled smokey for our stay.
The apartment was clean, had great views, coffee and a well stocked kitchen but it was very tight for three women. The sofa bed was very hard, and there were no sheets for it. There were some pillows in the closet but there were no pillowcases. So instead of each of us being able to have her own sleeping space we had to double up and share a bed which was not preferable.
The listing stated there is body soap and a bidet but there was not. I think this place has potential but it needs to be accurately listed and guests should set their expectations for a small place that would be good for two adults and maybe some small children.
reviews_details.host_response: Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôre glad you enjoyed the views, coffee and appreciated our efforts with the air purifier & treats. While we didn‚Äôt notice any cigarette smoke ourselves - even after checkout - we trust your experience and hope the purifier helped ensure clean air for your stay. Bedding (duvet, sheets, & pillow with pillowcase) for the sofa bed can be found inside the sofa storage itself. Since bedding is such an important detail we‚Äôll be sure to highlight this for future guests; however, we wish you had reached out - just as you did about the smoke - as it would have been a quick and simple fix to let you know where to find it. The square footage & floor plan are included in our listing so guests can ensure the space fits their needs, and we‚Äôve corrected an oversight in the amenities list (bidet) to keep everything accurate moving forward. All the best with your future travels.

reviews_details.review: We enjoyed our stay.  Super quiet and comfortable.  Great location.
reviews_details.host_response: We‚Äôre thrilled that you enjoyed your stay, Val. We welcome you back anytime.

reviews_details.review: It was a great location for downtown Calgary. Also, the bed was sooooo comfy!
reviews_details.host_response: We‚Äôre so glad you enjoyed your stay. The comfy bed will be waiting for you if you decide to return :)

reviews_details.review: Enjoyed our stay, beautiful condo; lots of natural lighting and more.
One of the best experience we had with Airbnb ever very kind people and the place is awesome
reviews_details.host_response: So glad you enjoyed your stay! We welcome you beck anytime.

reviews_details.review: Convenient location! The place was clean. The kitchen was well stocked. The expectations for check out cleaning was difficult as there was not cleaning products.
Clint and Diana were wonderful hosts and we loved being close to excellent restaurants and shopping. Thank you!
Very clear guide lines! Absolutely loved the stay at their gorgeous condo. Clint was very responsive and even tried to get us an early checkin. Highly recommend!
If I come back to Calgary, I will definitely book same place
Very nice apartment with a great view of the city. We will stay there again next time
Great location. Clean comfortable space!
Great hosts. The detailed instructions were very helpful.

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ5.0 ¬∑ 1 bedroom ¬∑ 1 bed ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Just steps from the vibrant energy of 17th Ave in Calgary, this suite invites you to unwind in style, offering a charming blend of eras where Victorian elegance meets midcentury warmth.There are 96 restaurants within 15 minutes of walking distance that are rated above 4 stars on Google review.Business License: BL282995Other things to noteWalking time to Analog Coffee - 1 minWalking time to Tomkins Park - 1 minWalking time to Save On Foods - 4 minsDriving Time to Calgary Tower - 7 minsDriving Time to Stampede Grounds - 7 minsDriving Time to Canmore - 1 hr 10 minsRegistration DetailsBL282995
reviews: Our stay at Bryn's place was absolutely perfect! The location is very central but on a quiet street right off the main road, with everything you would need in walking distance. The apartment was very clean & cozy with beautiful decor in every room! The kitchen was stocked with necessities and we enjoyed using the projector to watch movies. I would definitely stay here again or recommend this bnb to anyone visiting Calgary :)
I just want to say this is probably one of my favorites Airbnb ever. The location is perfect, Bryn was super friendly and the place is amazing. Everything was great so for sure I would recommend it.

This was a lovely Airbnb with lots of character and was a peaceful and relaxing spot after being out in the Rockies hiking all day. We really enjoyed the tea bar and exploring all the beautiful antiques in the home. There's no elevator and the unit is up 3 flights of stairs. It was really quiet and peaceful inside and when you'd walk out to the main street, you were part of all the action and in a great area buzzing with people, music, restaurants, and a great vibe. We recommend this Airbnb and would love to stay here again on our next visit!

This was a perfect space to stay and enjoy Stampede and explore the Beltline! The space was cute and clean, and the cooling unit in the bedroom kept it cool enough even in peak summer months. Bryn was very communicative and made checkin and checkout easy. I'd definitely come back!

OMG! What a great stay! I got an honor to stay at Bryn‚Äôs suite for five days and would love to spend more time but vacation days are running out. Apartment itself is a mix of Art Nouveau art gallery and highly functional apartment. Nice laundry room in the basement of building with high quality washer and dryer. Bryn is extremely attentive host and was instantly communicated to lend us a helpful hand. Location could not be any better. Right on 17th Ave but set a little back so it‚Äôs very tranquil. On one side we had shops and restaurants in walking distance and on the other side we had upscale neighborhood with walking paths to have an evening stroll. I couldn‚Äôt make any better choice for my stay in Calgary. Definitely will stay again.

Loved staying here! The place felt super cozy, and the movie setup was perfect for a chill night in. The bed was really comfy, and the kitchen had everything I needed. The location is awesome ‚Äî I walked to tons of great restaurants and grabbed coffee at Analog just a minute away. Definitely a great spot for a fun and easy stay in Calgary!

The Rosewood Suite was our perfect oasis during a whirlwind weekend in Calgary. Situated just off 17th street it gave us access to breakfast at our doorstep, lunch one block away, and late night snack spots and bars scoutable from our window.
Being just at the edge of downtown meant we were walking distance from all the best Museums, attractions and events (like Stampeded, Yeehaw!). But when we were done for the night, the suite felt tucked away just far enough from the bustle, so we could relax and enjoy the beautiful decor, creative amenities, and the star of the suite the king sized bed!!
All in all, this was a 11/10 experience. The location was perfect, the suite was idyllic and the our host was friendly and helpful. Absolutely my best experience in an Airbnb. Can't wait to visit again!
Ten out of ten affordable apartment.  Artsy-art deco feel to it.  One minute walk to 17th ave shops and restaurants but super quiet. Everything you need in the kitchen. Definitely recommended.

We booked this Air B&B on a whim to have a date night. The location was great which was the first reason we booked. However, the easy check in, amazing decor, cleanliness and welcoming setting will keep us coming back. A stone's throw to the many pubs, restaurants shops and amenities is amazing, however being half a block off the main strip allowed for a restful sleep. Parking included is also a plus as it is paid or permit parking only in the area. This is a great place to book with great ambience and convenient location. Will highly recommend to anyone traveling to Calgary.

My stay at Bryn's was perfect! I loved looking at all her art, appreciated the special touches she put in and definately enjoyed the location. I also loved that the space was squeaky clean!
Totally appreciate this space and will book again if I am called to the annual whoop up of the Stampede!

What a lovely air bnb!  The Rosewood Suite has a classic decor.  No detail is too small from the art wall covered in paintings to the furniture to the light fixtures and door knobs!  You can even look up to a constellation of stars in the bedroom.  It was such a relaxing and charming atmosphere.  The central location made it easy to get to anywhere in Calgary I wanted to go to.  And it was great to be able to walk to charming restaurants along 17th Ave  for breakfast and dinner.  I felt like I had truly gotten away for the weekend to someplace in Europe.   And the king size bed was so comfortable!  I often have a sore back when I sleep away from home but my back felt great and I had a terrific sleep both nights.

Bryn's apartment was great! The kitchen and the whole apartment are very tastefully decorated. We felt very comfortable, like at home. There are basic amenities in the kitchen, such as spices and oil, so you can prepare food right away. There are many lovely details and 17th Street is around the corner. We really liked it. Thank you!!
One of the most uniquely decorated air b n bs I‚Äôve stayed in. Bed was super comfortable. Excellent location. Would definitely stay again.

Fantastic stay ‚Äì quiet, cozy, and great location.
We had a great stay at this Airbnb, the unit is on the top floor of a six-unit building, and it was incredibly quiet‚Äîyou can‚Äôt hear neighbors or street noise, which is rare for such a prime location. Having a coffee shop and Shoppers Drug Mart right outside was super convenient for quick groceries and coffee in the AM.
The space itself was cozy and comfortable, especially in the living room looking out the window‚Äîbeautiful brick architecture, blue skies, and Calgary‚Äôs downtown skyline in the background. Also it was very cold outside so we stayed in most nights and tried out the home movie theater experience, it was very neat. I‚Äôd like to return in the summer to take full advantage of the walkability and everything 17th Ave has to offer. Highly recommend!
This is the most beautiful, luxurious airbnb I have ever stayed in. My only complaint is that I couldn‚Äôt stay forever.

We were lucky enough to spend a night at Bryn's place, and everything was perfect! The video projector screen, the bathtub, the decoration, the location in the city: we liked everything!
The little extra? The memory foam bed, amazing!
Bryn was also very responsive and full of good advice!
In short, I highly recommend it!

reviews_details.review: Our stay at Bryn's place was absolutely perfect! The location is very central but on a quiet street right off the main road, with everything you would need in walking distance. The apartment was very clean & cozy with beautiful decor in every room! The kitchen was stocked with necessities and we enjoyed using the projector to watch movies. I would definitely stay here again or recommend this bnb to anyone visiting Calgary :)
I just want to say this is probably one of my favorites Airbnb ever. The location is perfect, Bryn was super friendly and the place is amazing. Everything was great so for sure I would recommend it.

This was a lovely Airbnb with lots of character and was a peaceful and relaxing spot after being out in the Rockies hiking all day. We really enjoyed the tea bar and exploring all the beautiful antiques in the home. There's no elevator and the unit is up 3 flights of stairs. It was really quiet and peaceful inside and when you'd walk out to the main street, you were part of all the action and in a great area buzzing with people, music, restaurants, and a great vibe. We recommend this Airbnb and would love to stay here again on our next visit!

This was a perfect space to stay and enjoy Stampede and explore the Beltline! The space was cute and clean, and the cooling unit in the bedroom kept it cool enough even in peak summer months. Bryn was very communicative and made checkin and checkout easy. I'd definitely come back!

OMG! What a great stay! I got an honor to stay at Bryn‚Äôs suite for five days and would love to spend more time but vacation days are running out. Apartment itself is a mix of Art Nouveau art gallery and highly functional apartment. Nice laundry room in the basement of building with high quality washer and dryer. Bryn is extremely attentive host and was instantly communicated to lend us a helpful hand. Location could not be any better. Right on 17th Ave but set a little back so it‚Äôs very tranquil. On one side we had shops and restaurants in walking distance and on the other side we had upscale neighborhood with walking paths to have an evening stroll. I couldn‚Äôt make any better choice for my stay in Calgary. Definitely will stay again.

Loved staying here! The place felt super cozy, and the movie setup was perfect for a chill night in. The bed was really comfy, and the kitchen had everything I needed. The location is awesome ‚Äî I walked to tons of great restaurants and grabbed coffee at Analog just a minute away. Definitely a great spot for a fun and easy stay in Calgary!

The Rosewood Suite was our perfect oasis during a whirlwind weekend in Calgary. Situated just off 17th street it gave us access to breakfast at our doorstep, lunch one block away, and late night snack spots and bars scoutable from our window.
Being just at the edge of downtown meant we were walking distance from all the best Museums, attractions and events (like Stampeded, Yeehaw!). But when we were done for the night, the suite felt tucked away just far enough from the bustle, so we could relax and enjoy the beautiful decor, creative amenities, and the star of the suite the king sized bed!!
All in all, this was a 11/10 experience. The location was perfect, the suite was idyllic and the our host was friendly and helpful. Absolutely my best experience in an Airbnb. Can't wait to visit again!
Ten out of ten affordable apartment.  Artsy-art deco feel to it.  One minute walk to 17th ave shops and restaurants but super quiet. Everything you need in the kitchen. Definitely recommended.

We booked this Air B&B on a whim to have a date night. The location was great which was the first reason we booked. However, the easy check in, amazing decor, cleanliness and welcoming setting will keep us coming back. A stone's throw to the many pubs, restaurants shops and amenities is amazing, however being half a block off the main strip allowed for a restful sleep. Parking included is also a plus as it is paid or permit parking only in the area. This is a great place to book with great ambience and convenient location. Will highly recommend to anyone traveling to Calgary.

My stay at Bryn's was perfect! I loved looking at all her art, appreciated the special touches she put in and definately enjoyed the location. I also loved that the space was squeaky clean!
Totally appreciate this space and will book again if I am called to the annual whoop up of the Stampede!

What a lovely air bnb!  The Rosewood Suite has a classic decor.  No detail is too small from the art wall covered in paintings to the furniture to the light fixtures and door knobs!  You can even look up to a constellation of stars in the bedroom.  It was such a relaxing and charming atmosphere.  The central location made it easy to get to anywhere in Calgary I wanted to go to.  And it was great to be able to walk to charming restaurants along 17th Ave  for breakfast and dinner.  I felt like I had truly gotten away for the weekend to someplace in Europe.   And the king size bed was so comfortable!  I often have a sore back when I sleep away from home but my back felt great and I had a terrific sleep both nights.

Bryns Wohnung war toll! Die K√ºche und die ganze Wohnung sind sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Wir f√ºhlten uns sehr wohl, wie zuhause. Es gibt die Grundausstattung in der K√ºche, wie Gew√ºrze und √ñl, so dass man gleich Essen zubereiten kann. Es gibt viele liebevolle Details und die 17. Stra√üe ist um die Ecke. Es hat uns wirklich gut gefallen. Vielen Dank!!
One of the most uniquely decorated air b n bs I‚Äôve stayed in. Bed was super comfortable. Excellent location. Would definitely stay again.

Fantastic stay ‚Äì quiet, cozy, and great location.
We had a great stay at this Airbnb, the unit is on the top floor of a six-unit building, and it was incredibly quiet‚Äîyou can‚Äôt hear neighbors or street noise, which is rare for such a prime location. Having a coffee shop and Shoppers Drug Mart right outside was super convenient for quick groceries and coffee in the AM.
The space itself was cozy and comfortable, especially in the living room looking out the window‚Äîbeautiful brick architecture, blue skies, and Calgary‚Äôs downtown skyline in the background. Also it was very cold outside so we stayed in most nights and tried out the home movie theater experience, it was very neat. I‚Äôd like to return in the summer to take full advantage of the walkability and everything 17th Ave has to offer. Highly recommend!
This is the most beautiful, luxurious airbnb I have ever stayed in. My only complaint is that I couldn‚Äôt stay forever.

listing_title: Modern Condo, Skyline views, & Parking in Downtown
listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: This condo is situated in the DESIGN district of BELTLINE, ENJOY the WALKABILITY to:the BUSINESS core, all the BEST restaurants at the FAMOUS Stephen and 17th Avenue, Calgary Tower, the CLASSIC Jack Singer Concert Hall, Arts Commons-the performing arts Centre, the NEW Central Library, Bow River, Peace Bridge, Chinatown, the historic City Hall and other mid-20 century buildings from the post World War II, the Fort Calgary and Lougheed House Historic Sites, the well-known Saddle Dome at the Stampede Ground, BMO Convention Centre, Cowboy Casino, Studio Bell National Music Centre, the Contemporary Calgary Art Gallery, Flight Museum, and much more!NOTE:  Condo is close to the Main Stampede Entrance at:               1410 Olympic Way SE, Calgary               (Approx. 20 - 25 minute walk from condo. TIP: get a day stamp                 at any exit to RE-ENTER to the Stampede any time of the day.)Forget about the EXPENSIVE parking, just walk to the Saddledome to watch a hockey game, a concert, or for a convention.Calgary downtown has the world most extensive pedestrain skywalk network called the "Plus 15". This SKYWALK network with a total length of 16 kilometers and 86 bridges connecting to 130 buildings in downtown.The C-train is FREE to commute within the DOWNTOWN core areas.The must-visit Calgary Zoo is only two train stops away from downtown, and the Telus Spark Science Centre is only across the road from the Zoo.ON-IT Banff and Canmore Commuter is also available on the weekends in downtown (Summer only) for $10 each way to tour Banff and Canmore to view the Rocky Mountains!! The $10 fare also includes connected buses to other parts and parks of Banff for the day.Safeway and Co-op are both close by for shopping groceries.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: Bus and C-train are close by. Or call an Uber or Lyft, or use Communauto (car share) for only 41 cent per minute (includes gas) within the city!Express Airport Bus 300 : from city to airport $3.65 CADfrom Airport to city (airport taxes applied) $11 CAD - purchase a day-pass for the same price to tour around Calgary for the day.                              ***C-train is FREE for commuting within the downtown core areas!Many pay street parking are available in downtown. Street parking is only FREE from Monday-Saturday AFTER 6pm and free all day on Sundays and holidays. ON-IT Banff and Canmore Commuter is also available on the weekends in downtown for $10 each way to tour Banff and Canmore (for Summer only).You can also purchase tickets to Lake Louise with ON-It.The Royal Tyrrell Museum of Palaeontology in Drumheller features one of the world's largest displays of DINOSAURS. It is about one and a half-hour drive from Calgary.Calgary to Banff - an one hour and 30 minute driveBanff to Lake Louise - a 38-minute driveCalgary to Lake Louise - a two-hour driveCalgary to JASPER - a 4.5-hour driveCalgary to Edmonton - a 3-hour drive

We had a great time at JD Lee‚Äôs place! He made it possible for us to stay there on very short notice, and the communication couldn‚Äôt have been better. The location is central and close to several bars and restaurants. We‚Äôd definitely recommend it!

Interior was clean and well stocked. Way too hot in the unit even though it was cool outside the entire time so I left sliding door open at night which allowed smells and noise.  Air conditioner did not cool off the unit even when running all night, whether or not door was left open. Sliding door did not have a lock anyway. I asked how to cool off the unit, with cryptic response. I gave up and left after 4 days of sweat. Too smelly and hot. Also scary building for a single woman. Above liquor store, homeless people, marijuana,

Great location, and very good communication. JD reacted quickly and tried his best to solve any problem as fast as possible. Unfortunately, we cannot give 5 stars as there were too many things that would have needed long-term maintenance beforehand. We were constantly confronted with new problems . The first night, we could not find any bedding, and there was only 1 towel. They were all well hidden in the couch, but we could not find where and how to open it. The main light in the living room was broken. The mosquito net had a huge hole. The bathroom sink was clogged up, and JD had to come twice to resolve the problem. The shower hose was full of holes; JD bought a new one and put it in the same day. Last not least, the oven did not heat up beyond 270 F which jeopardized our cooking plans.
As JD was very responsive, we trust that he resolves all the issues soon. If we had not been busy for 3 days with repair requests, we might have given 5 stars; maybe next time.

The unit was well kept, clean and had a minimalist feel to it. The location is excellent because it close to many restaurants and shopping. Otherwise, highly recommend this spot.

reviews_details.host_response:
We appreciate all guest perspectives. Unfortunately this is a gross mischaracterization of what occurred.
We send the arrival process 3 times before guests arrive and we urge them to review in advance to ensure a positive arrival experience. In this case the guest did not do that and we were happy to assist him, responding to questions within seconds. Unfortunately again he did not read the instructions even after that which led to the guest being confused, we continued to assist happily.
Clarification, there is no fee if you arrive between 4pm to 10pm. Another example of the guests confusion.
Once the guest arrived he was upset because he said he needed two bedrooms, which we do not advertise.
We do our best to help guests and in this case it was outside of our control.
Our over 6,000 reviews showcase our consistent positive guest experiences :)

location_details.title: Neighbourhood highlights
location_details.value: Stay in the heart of Calgary‚Äôs Beltline ‚Äî one of the city‚Äôs most dynamic and walkable neighbourhoods. Just steps from downtown, the Beltline is known for its trendy caf√©s, boutique shops, craft breweries, and some of Calgary‚Äôs best restaurants. Explore nearby 17th Avenue, often called the ‚ÄúRed Mile,‚Äù for its lively nightlife, patios, and local charm.Guests will enjoy easy access to Stampede Park, the Saddledome, and the BMO Centre, making it an ideal location during events like the Calgary Stampede or conferences. The area also boasts beautiful green spaces like Central Memorial Park and a variety of transit options to get around the city with ease.Whether you‚Äôre in town for business or leisure, the Beltline offers a perfect blend of convenience, culture, and city energy.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: The Beltline is one of Calgary‚Äôs most walkable neighborhoods, with everything you need just steps away. Stroll to restaurants, caf√©s, grocery stores, and nightlife along vibrant 17th Avenue or downtown.For longer trips, public transit is easily accessible ‚Äî multiple bus routes and the CTrain (Calgary‚Äôs light rail system) are within walking distance, providing quick access to all parts of the city, including Stampede Park, the Calgary Tower, and the airport.Prefer to drive? Paid street parking and parkades are nearby, and ride-sharing services like Uber are widely available.Whether on foot, bike, transit, or car, getting around from the Beltline is fast and convenient.

The front desk had to tell us how their ‚Äúguest parking‚Äù works. However getting in contact with host was easy and he responded/clarified the parking situation immediately. even though the train tracks are there you never really heard them and the people on the streets were polite and minded there own business as long as you mind your own. the quick response times for questions the answers came quick and we're very detailed unfortunately we went when the pool was shut down because winter is coming but definitely love to check the place out again come summer check out the pool and yeah other than that everything was relaxing calm quiet unless you had the balcony door open and you heard the train

My wife and I stayed here during stampede week.  The condo itself was nice and was in a good location downtown to get to bars and restaurants as well as public transportation.  There are a lot of homeless in the immediate area due to bottle recycling next door, but similar to other areas downtown.  Noise was a problem the entire time we stayed, condo backs up to Badlands concert venue which has techno music playing from 6pm to 2am for the 10 days of stampede week.  The music and bass made it impossible to sleep or watch tv at night.  The venue also does random sound checks in the morning and through the day.  WiFi in the condo didn‚Äôt work well the entire time, could barely have one thing working at a time, if streaming tv, personal devices didn‚Äôt work well and vice verse.  Contacted host after second day but no improvement.  Seems like most people in the building were short term and there for stampede week as well and not actual residents.  If not for noise and wifi would‚Äôve been great
Mo‚Äôs place was great! Easy to get to and the instructions were clear. It was in a great central location and I would stay here again!
Beautiful apartment with a nice view on the balcony downtown. Apartment was very clean and the hosts were quick to answer any questions we had

Couple of things that can be improved
- no hair dryer
- shower head did not work all that well.
- some of the lights weren't working in the bedroom
It was a nice place to stay and Mo was a responsible host, replying most of messages and ad-hoc requests within short time. I enjoyed staying in MO‚Äôs place.
Was the perfect place to stay for my solo trip, perfect location in downtown.
The location was great and the bnb was a good size !!
Amazing place views and stay! Highly recommended! I'll be sure to stay again
Awesome appartement. Clean and the patio was a pleasant place after a long day of walk.

Everything about the stay went without a hitch.
Would stay there again when in Calgary.

The apartment is as described in the listing, very close to the city center that can be reached on foot without problem (about 10 minutes), it is very well-equipped, clean and close (about 400m) to bus line 300 to/from the airport.
The balcony with its bench is a real plus.
Mo is very responsive.
Thanks for the stay.

Great place with excellent location!
Mo & Benji are great hosts and extremely responsive.   I absolutely enjoyed staying, the location was fantastic.

description: Welcome to our stylish one-bedroom apartment, perfectly situated in the heart of the vibrant Mission community in Calgary. With its central location, you'll find yourself just minutes away from the world-renowned Calgary Stampede and the iconic Saddledome.Portable A/C in unitThe spaceThis modern and thoughtfully designed space is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers looking to experience the best that Calgary has to offer. Step outside and discover the trendy 17th Avenue, known for its lively atmosphere, charming boutiques, and diverse culinary scene. Additionally, the nearby Safeway ensures convenient access to any essentials you may need during your stay.Parking in the city can be a hassle, but worry not! Our apartment comes with the added benefit of underground parking, ensuring a stress-free experience for our guests.Notable features:- High Speed Internet- Sofa Bed- One FREE underground parking stall- Smart TV with FREE Netflix (No cable TV)- Keurig Coffee Machine with complimentary coffee- Washer/Dryer w/complementary detergent and dryer sheets- Fresh Linens- Large Fully Equip Kitchen- Complimentary Shampoo & Body Wash- Hairdryer- Soft towels- Iron & ironing boardID Verification is required for our property.We do not accept arrivals 2 am onwards. If you plan on arriving near or after this time, please refrain from booking. Thank youGuest accessYou will have entire private access to the condo.For patio or balcony access, please use caution and avoid fully closing the doors, as they may lock automatically behind you.Registration DetailsBL269584

name: Rental unit in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.92 ¬∑ 2 bedrooms ¬∑ 2 beds ¬∑ 2 bathrooms
description: Welcome to Colours by Battistella! Spectacular condo located in the prestigious neighborhood of Beltline, Calgary. This amazing 921 sqft condo (2 Bed+2 Bath) is in a great location just walking distance to shops, restaurants, pubs, parks, cafes, public transportation, 17th Avenue, Stampede grounds, The Saddledome, and its close proximity to the core. With two walls of ceiling to floor windows, you will see spectacular unobstructed downtown views. Relax and enjoy the amazing panoramic views.The spaceLocation Location Location!!. Colours by Battistella building is defined as a landmark in the Victoria Park area. This is because of its spectacular display of architectural exterior that matches with its interior. Whether you are visiting for business or pleasure, Colours by Battistella provides the best short rental destination for you, family and friends. Touring around the beautiful downtown Calgary, exploring 17th Avenue unique shops, or enjoying a memorable nightlife experience, are just some of the main highlights of this airbnb experience.  City Treasure on 13th - This beautiful condo unit offers more than you can imagine. Breathtaking City skylines and a cozy, elegant environment for your enjoyment. Features include polished concrete flooring, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and 9.5 foot ceilings. Sit on your balcony, relax and enjoy the amazing panoramic views. Enjoy the convenience of In-suite laundry and a heated underground parking.Guest accessThis condo is exclusively yours, without interruption for the duration of your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself and family at home. Please note that all building/condo unit access information will be provided the day of check-in. The guests will also have access to an intimate promenade on the fourth floor, offering a space to connect and relax.Other things to noteColours by Battistella is a privately-owned residential condo building with no specific services or amenities for rental guests. All guests will be required to acknowledge in writing that they will comply with applicable residential Bylaws and community standards at all times during their stay. All guests are require to observe and comply with the Host's rules and regulations.  Guests are also required to Agree and Comply with the Condominium Property Act, the bylaws and its rules and regulations of the condominium corporation during the duration of the guests' stay. Rules, bylaws and regulation must be read and agreed by the guests prior to occupancy is authorized. Hard copy will also be available to the guests inside the condo unit.Registration DetailsBL267340

reviews: Navin was an excellent host. Very quick to respond & super friendly! My family decided to extend our trip after 1 week staying here and he was very quick to accommodate an extension. Check in and check out was super easy & the parking space was an awesome feature since we had our vehicle. Location was great with lots of restaurants nearby. Would definitely stay here again!

Had a great stay at Navin‚Äôs apartment. It is in a great downtown location and is easy to walk to restaurants and bars etc.
Navin gave us suggestions for places to eat and things to do in the city. I would definitely recommend his apartment if you are planning a stay in Calgary.

I had a fantastic experience staying at Navin's place. The home was exactly as described‚Äîclean, and comfortable. The check-in process was smooth, and the host was responsive and helpful throughout my stay. The location was perfect‚Äîwalking distance to lots of restaurants, bars, river, and park. I would absolutely stay here again and recommend it to anyone visiting Calgary.

My friend and I had a great stay at Navin's place. The apartment was comfortable and welcoming. The neighbourhood was ideal: easy to get coffee in the morning, very walkable.
One thing to note is that one of the bedrooms is windowless while the other bedroom is separated from the shared area by translucent sliding doors. There was no problem with privacy, but light from the shared area does diffuse through to that bedroom. So if there's anyone in the group likely to stay up late in the shared area, they should probably take that bedroom. My friend and I were both on a similar schedule so it wasn't a problem for us.
Overall it was a comfortable and convenient place to stay, at a vary fair price. I'd definitely stay there again.
Great spot to stay for the night! Plenty of restaurants nearby and everything was walkable. The place was super clean and we enjoyed the views from the balcony. Would stay again!

Navin‚Äôs place is spotless and conveniently located within walking distance to everything! It‚Äôs just a 5-minute walk to H-Mart and Shoppers, and about 10 minutes to the train station. Navin is very responsive, and I must say, the rate I got was an absolute steal.

description: Welcome to our charming heritage property in Calgary! Immerse yourself in rich history and character in this renovated apartment. Located near 4th Street and 17th Avenue, explore shops and cafes, with bike and walking paths nearby. Experience old-world charm with modern comforts like marble countertops and fireplaces. Whether for business or pleasure, enjoy plush bedding and high-speed internet. Come experience Calgary's magic from our unique hideaway. Welcome home!The spaceNestled in the charming neighborhood of Cliff Bungalow, Calgary, this heritage property blends timeless character with modern comforts. Impeccably maintained, our family-run retreat offers a unique escape that‚Äôs hard to capture without experiencing it firsthand. Enjoy a lush garden oasis teeming with birds and squirrels, a serene hideaway amidst the city‚Äôs vibrant hustle and bustle. Perfect for nature lovers and city explorers alike, our home promises an unforgettable stay.Other things to notePlease note that you will be required to climb one story of stairs to access this unit.Sofa bed is a futon, not a pull out bed.This is a heritage home, and therefore noise travels easily. Please understand that the quiet hours are strictly enforced for the pleasure of our guests.We have a designated parking available for our guests. Please note that it accommodates a single vehicle and may be quite snug for larger vehicles (especially taller ones). If this poses an issue, we can assist in registering your vehicle for street parking to override the parking time allotments. Just let us know, and we‚Äôll be happy to help ensure a smooth parking experience for you.Registration DetailsBL279210

location_details.title: Neighbourhood highlights
location_details.value: Cliff Bungalow is a historic and vibrant neighborhood nestled in the heart of Calgary, Alberta. Known for its charming character homes, tree-lined streets, and eclectic atmosphere, this community offers a unique blend of urban living and peaceful retreat. Residents enjoy easy access to boutique shops, trendy cafes, and local eateries along 4th Street and 17th Avenue. With picturesque views of the city skyline and proximity to parks and pathways, Cliff Bungalow is a sought-after destination for those seeking a dynamic and connected lifestyle in Calgary.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: There is one designated carport stall for guests. There is also street parking available with a guest pass to override the 2-hour allotment upon request. All areas are walkable with plenty of bike lanes and e-scooters.
