description: Miso is designed with a refined Japanese-inspired aesthetic, drawing from warm, earthy tones reminiscent of traditional Japanese palettes. Natural light bathes the space, highlighting the harmony between modern urban living and traditional, calming hues. The design merges contemporary urbanism with a touch of understated Japanese elegance, offering a tranquil escape with a stunning city backdrop.We are excited to Host you!The spaceThis well designed suite can comfortably host up to 4,  however should privacy be desired it is best suited for 2 people with the single bedroom in the suite. ‚Ä¢ Queen sized bed and ample clothing storage during your stay. ‚Ä¢ Sofa bed with available comfort sleep topper ‚Ä¢ Fully outfitted bathroom,  including tub for relaxing and unwinding. o‚Ä¢ Spa like amenities in the bathroom‚Ä¢ Fully equipped Kitchen with all cookware, bakeware and utensils so you can create full meals during your stay. ‚Ä¢ Well equipped coffee station with single cup dispenser ‚Ä¢ Bean grinder and French press in suite.Please note: There is no parking stall assigned for the unit, nor is parking available in the building. There is street parking available for a fee.Guest accessGuests have full access to the entire condominium, including 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, designer kitchen, living room, and private outdoor balcony space (balcony furniture and barbeque seasonally available based on weather) Registered guests are welcome to use the shared building amenities including a gym, outdoor pool, amenity TV room, event room (must be booked), and outdoor patio including barbeque and Fire Table. Note: Shared building amenities are subject to both seasonal and functional availability and access to the same is not in control of the host and may not be available during your stay. Availability may change due to unforeseen or unplanned circumstances.  Lack of shared amenities availability will not constitute a refund.Other things to noteAdditionally, TV Use:The TV is set up for streaming services only. Guests are welcome to log in with their own accounts during their stay.Please note that cable, pay-per-view, or other paid content cannot be ordered. Any additional charges related to purchased services or subscriptions during your stay will be the guest‚Äôs responsibility.Lastly, you will be contacted by our third-party I.D. verification service (‚ÄúTruvi‚Äù), where you will need to choose either a damage deposit ($700 CAD (refundable, subject to a small processing fee) or a damage waiver option ($50CAD (non-refundable, no deposit required collected by the third-party provider).  All reservations are subject to this verification process being successful.Most guests prefer the waiver option since it‚Äôs quick and hassle-free.Registration DetailsBL285929
reviews: Beautifull place with an amazing view of the city. Very peacefull with no city disturbances. Centric and well located, close walk to Calgary Transit (Train) as well as grocery store (Safeway) and an excellent choice of restaurants (Orchard, Scarpeta‚Ä¶) close by. Definitivelly would stay here as many times as posible. Even for a day or night in. Felt right at home.

David is an absolutely great host! He was always polite, attentive, and ready to assist. The accommodation met our expectations in every possible way ‚Äì it was cozy, warm, clean, and comfortable. David was very hands-on, always proactive in finding solutions to any issues. I would highly recommend him and his accommodation to anyone

David and his team were amazing! Great host, very responsive and accommodating. The unit itself was comfy with nice views and walkable distance to places we needed. We had everything we needed and more! The washing machine and the dryer are massive!
We actually wanted to extend our stay but unfortunately it was already booked! We will definitely want to stay here again! Thanks for having us!

We had an amazing stay ‚Äî the place was exactly as described (maybe even better!). Clean, comfy, and felt like a little slice of Calgary heaven.
The hosts? Absolute gems. Super responsive, always helpful, and funny to boot ‚Äî felt like texting a friend, not a stranger.
If I'm ever back in Calgary, this is 100% where I‚Äôm staying. I hear they have other properties too... and yes, I‚Äôm already stalking them. #HostGoals

Loved this place! The pictures are spot on and it was walkable to all of the things to do and places to go in downtown Calgary. The 24 hr security was a nice touch, also. When I‚Äôm in Calgary again, I‚Äôd definitely book this place!
Downtown Calgary has its problems. Ok if you have a car but we didn't. Alot of homeless and troubled people in the area if you are walking. It is very central for exploring the city.

David was incredibly attentive and gave ample instructions. Accommodations were exactly as described and very nice. Perfect location. Highly recommend and would stay there every time I‚Äôm in Calgary. Thanks to David and his team.

David was a wonderful host, very responsive and friendly. place was beautiful and clean. everything was within walking distance. The condo was perfect, modern and stunning views of downtown Calgary. Would highly recommend staying here! Everything was a 10/10

This Airbnb was fantastic, spotlessly clean, modern, and fully equipped with everything you might need, including a laundry machine and dishwasher.
The bed was incredibly comfortable, and the spacious balcony was perfect for relaxing and enjoying the outdoors.
David was a great host, very responsive and provided clear, helpful instructions throughout our stay.
While the unit doesn‚Äôt come with a designated parking spot, we had no trouble finding street parking during our entire week-long stay.

Miso was amazing and this is an Airbnb that we would seek out to stay in again. It had everything we needed, the location was nice and easy to get around, and David was so communicative.
The unit itself is a little smaller than we expected but it was arranged and decorated so tastefully that the size wasn't an issue whatsoever. It was absolutely beautiful inside and completely functional.
Check-in and check-out were both extremely easy. This place was truly hassle-free.
Thanks again to the hosts for a beautiful stay and exceptional communication!

listing_name: Entire condo in Calgary, Canada

location_details.title: Neighborhood highlights
location_details.value: This vibrant area is the perfect spot for those seeking a blend of city living and community vibes. Experience the best of both worlds with easy access to downtown and a variety of local shops and services at your doorstep. Immerse yourself in the arts and culture scene of Calgary, with galleries and studios just a short walk away. The building itself offers modern and stylish living spaces, complete with amenities such as a fitness center, rooftop terrace, and bike storage. Live the ultimate urban lifestyle in the heart of Calgary's most desirable neighborhood.

location_details.title: Getting around
location_details.value: C-Train within 3 blocks distanceUber is available through the appE-bikes seasonably availableWalkable neighborhood.

description_by_sections.value: Miso is designed with a refined Japanese-inspired aesthetic, drawing from warm, earthy tones reminiscent of traditional Japanese palettes. Natural light bathes the space, highlighting the harmony between modern urban living and traditional, calming hues. The design merges contemporary urbanism with a touch of understated Japanese elegance, offering a tranquil escape with a stunning city backdrop.We are excited to Host you!

description_by_sections.title: The space
description_by_sections.value: This well designed suite can comfortably host up to 4,  however should privacy be desired it is best suited for 2 people with the single bedroom in the suite. ‚Ä¢ Queen sized bed and ample clothing storage during your stay. ‚Ä¢ Sofa bed with available comfort sleep topper ‚Ä¢ Fully outfitted bathroom,  including tub for relaxing and unwinding. o‚Ä¢ Spa like amenities in the bathroom‚Ä¢ Fully equipped Kitchen with all cookware, bakeware and utensils so you can create full meals during your stay. ‚Ä¢ Well equipped coffee station with single cup dispenser ‚Ä¢ Bean grinder and French press in suite.Please note: There is no parking stall assigned for the unit, nor is parking available in the building. There is street parking available for a fee.

description_by_sections.title: Guest access
description_by_sections.value: Guests have full access to the entire condominium, including 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, designer kitchen, living room, and private outdoor balcony space (balcony furniture and barbeque seasonally available based on weather) Registered guests are welcome to use the shared building amenities including a gym, outdoor pool, amenity TV room, event room (must be booked), and outdoor patio including barbeque and Fire Table. Note: Shared building amenities are subject to both seasonal and functional availability and access to the same is not in control of the host and may not be available during your stay. Availability may change due to unforeseen or unplanned circumstances.  Lack of shared amenities availability will not constitute a refund.

description_by_sections.title: Other things to note
description_by_sections.value: Additionally, TV Use:The TV is set up for streaming services only. Guests are welcome to log in with their own accounts during their stay.Please note that cable, pay-per-view, or other paid content cannot be ordered. Any additional charges related to purchased services or subscriptions during your stay will be the guest‚Äôs responsibility.Lastly, you will be contacted by our third-party I.D. verification service (‚ÄúTruvi‚Äù), where you will need to choose either a damage deposit ($700 CAD (refundable, subject to a small processing fee) or a damage waiver option ($50CAD (non-refundable, no deposit required collected by the third-party provider).  All reservations are subject to this verification process being successful.Most guests prefer the waiver option since it‚Äôs quick and hassle-free.

cancellation_policy.cancellation_value: Full refund if cancel within 24 hours after booking. Get back 100% of what you paid..

reviews_details.review: Beautifull place with an amazing view of the city. Very peacefull with no city disturbances. Centric and well located, close walk to Calgary Transit (Train) as well as grocery store (Safeway) and an excellent choice of restaurants (Orchard, Scarpeta‚Ä¶) close by. Definitivelly would stay here as many times as posible. Even for a day or night in. Felt right at home.

David is an absolutely great host! He was always polite, attentive, and ready to assist. The accommodation met our expectations in every possible way ‚Äì it was cozy, warm, clean, and comfortable. David and his team were amazing! Great host, very responsive and accommodating. The unit itself was comfy with nice views and walkable distance to places we needed. We had everything we needed and more! The washing machine and the dryer are massive!
We actually wanted to extend our stay but unfortunately it was already booked! We will definitely want to stay here again! Thanks for having us!

We had an amazing stay ‚Äî the place was exactly as described (maybe even better!). Clean, comfy, and felt like a little slice of Calgary heaven.
The hosts? Absolute gems. Super responsive, always helpful, and funny to boot ‚Äî felt like texting a friend, not a stranger.
If I'm ever back in Calgary, this is 100% where I‚Äôm staying. I hear they have other properties too... and yes, I‚Äôm already stalking them. #HostGoals

We loved hosting you and truly hope to welcome you back ‚Äî whether in Calgary, at our Gull Lake cabin, or soon in Austin, Texas!
#HostGoalsGoesBothWays

Downtown Calgary has its problems. Ok if you have a car but we didn't. Alot of homeless and troubled people in the area if you are walking. It is very central for exploring the city.

reviews: Wonderful stay! The place was exactly as described, spotlessly clean, and the host was responsive and helpful. Check-in was smooth, location was perfect for our needs, and all amenities worked great. Would absolutely stay here again and highly recommend to others. Thank you for a fantastic experience!

Chloe & Jason were phenomenal! Incredibly smooth check in and very thorough PDF doc outlining everything for the condo from check in & check out to amenities and even recommended spots! The condo itself was perfect and made for a wonderful stay! Would highly recommend and will definitely be back! Thanks again!

Large and comfortable apartment in Calgary.
We had to book the apartment very short notice due to a cancelation we received.
This was not an issue and we are very grateful for the great Organisation.
The bed in the big bedroom is large and very comfortable.
The view from the apartment is just amazing.
We really enjoyed the stay and can only recommend.

Very organized and looked exactly like the pictures. The communication was very open and available ALOT of details and instructions. Overall great stay I would stay here again. Thanks for being great Hosts Jason and Chloe.

I stayed here for 5 nights a my Mom. Always a treat getting to spend time with her, and staying at Chloe and Jason‚Äôs for the bill perfectly.
There‚Äôs a lot going on in the neighborhood. Good restaurants and bars, real businesses, and other residential projects. I was able to walk to my morning meetings downtown in no time. 17th Street is also just a quick walk with more bars and restaurants and even a pharmacy.
The suite is generous and beautiful. It‚Äôs very well designed and the two balconies face South and East. This isn‚Äôt your typical condo project - you don‚Äôt have to leave your room to change your mind :)
Chloe and Jason made sure everything was taken care of and responded inside of 10 minutes and sometimes immediately. It was very reliable communication.
Plenty of pillows and comfortable bedding to melt into after marathon days.

I wanted to share my stay in this apartment. The apartment was fabulous. The booking went smooth. I give them 5/5 but I faced a scary experience with the building itself. They have two garages in the underground parking. The main one and there's another trap metal door the further you drive down. If you drive an SUV it will give a small height space. I drove through this trap door following another car infront of me with a reasonable allowance. I followed since I was close to the car and the door was fully open when I looked. As I was in the middle I heard a sound that was the metal door hitting the top of my Audi q7 shattering the top of my windshield. Thankfully I was not injured but my hope through this message is that people will be careful with the garage when they stay at this location.
Thanks,
Moira
What a great view!! We enjoyed this condo and super easy to get around downtown
Great place for the price! We enjoyed our stay and the views of both the mountains and the city skyline. Comfortable furniture as well.
The place is extremely beautiful, very clean and perfect location. The view is extraordinary and we are looking forward to come back. We strongly recomand it to others
We had a great time at this location. Everything was really close, and the view was unforgettable.

We had a great stay at this Airbnb! The host was super friendly and very responsive throughout our stay. The unit was clean, well-maintained, and comfortably fit five people. The check-in process was very clear and smooth, and overall, we‚Äôre really happy with our experience.
One suggestion for the host: the checkout instructions ask guests to pile up used towels, linens, and rags in the bedroom. While it‚Äôs understandable to help the cleaning staff identify used items, I‚Äôd personally prefer if the host‚Äôs team handled that entirely to avoid any hygiene issues‚Äîespecially since guests might accidentally forget something.
Also worth mentioning (as other reviews have noted), there are some homeless people around the neighborhood, but this didn‚Äôt affect our stay and is, of course, outside the host‚Äôs control.
Overall, we‚Äôd definitely recommend this place and would stay again!

We were honestly quite disappointed with our 2-night stay, mainly because of two things. First, when we arrived, the master bedroom wasn‚Äôt clean at all. the floor was still dirty, like it hadn‚Äôt even been swept. The towels also smelled bad and we had to wash them before using them. The sofa in the living room also had an unpleasant smell which made it uncomfortable to sit on.
Second, the TV wasn‚Äôt working the whole time we were there. We were told it was already having issues and still being fixed but we feel like it should have been sorted out before our check-in. We were told multiple times that someone would come by to fix it, so we waited the whole day but no one showed up. That was really frustrating.
We paid the full price expecting a relaxing stay, but instead, it ended up being stressful. Please make sure the place is fully cleaned and ready before guests arrive. The thing is, the unit itself is actually nice and the view is beautiful. It just needs be maintained well.

This property was exactly what I needed during my stay in Calgary: spacious, well-equipped, and ideally located.
While the check-in process may seem a bit tricky at first, the hosts have provided an incredibly detailed and clear PDF guide that makes everything smooth and straightforward. Once inside, the space far exceeded my expectations, with stunning views and thoughtful touches throughout.
It's worth noting that some of the surrounding area faces social challenges, which are beyond the hosts‚Äô control, just something to be aware of. That said, the secure parking and overall convenience of the location more than made up for it.
I genuinely appreciated the care and effort the hosts put into making this a great stay.
Thanks again, and hats off to the hosts for doing such a great job. Keep it up!
One of the Best building in Downtown area, the best view and location
Chloe and Jason were good hosts I‚Äôll visit again.

Overall, the room is spacious and clean.They responded very quickly and were very friendly.The location is also very good, and you can walk to the nearby supermarket and restaurants.
The minor complaints were that there was no hair dryer, Netflix could not be watched in the designated way, there were no tissues, and the neighbors and surroundings were noisy until the middle of the night on Saturday night.
But I don't have any major complaints.
We have a very good place to stay.
Nice and spacious great location
It was a fun experience staying downtown.  Great views.
Lovely condo, great area and excellent hosts!
Great Place! Easy communication!
Great accomodation

This bright and modern 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo is perched above the city and features two private balconies with sweeping skyline views perfect for your morning coffee or sunset wind-down.Key Features:‚Ä¢ Prime downtown location ‚Äì Walk to Stampede Grounds, Calgary Tower, 17th Ave, river pathways, and more‚Ä¢ Two private balconies ‚Äì Double the space, double the views‚Ä¢ Free underground parking ‚Äì Safe, secure, and included‚Ä¢ Floor-to-ceiling windows ‚Äì Soak in natural light all day‚Ä¢ High-speed Wi-Fi & Smart TV ‚Äì Stream your favorites with ease‚Ä¢ Fully stocked kitchen ‚Äì Cook and entertain in style‚Ä¢ In-suite laundry ‚Äì Ideal for longer stays‚Ä¢ Gym & pool access ‚Äì Stay active or take a relaxing dip‚Ä¢ Modern, comfortable furnishings ‚Äì Designed with both style and comfort in mindWhether you're working remotely, vacationing, or simply exploring Calgary, this sub-penthouse is a perfect blend of luxury and convenience  your private oasis above the city.

host_details.response_time: They typically respond within an hour

reviews_details.review: Wonderful stay! The place was exactly as described, spotlessly clean, and the host was responsive and helpful. Check-in was smooth, location was perfect for our needs, and all amenities worked great. Would absolutely stay here again and highly recommend to others. Thank you for a fantastic experience!

Chloe & Jason were phenomenal! Incredibly smooth check in and very thorough PDF doc outlining everything for the condo from check in & check out to amenities and even recommended spots! The condo itself was perfect and made for a wonderful stay! Would highly recommend and will definitely be back! Thanks again!

Large and comfortable apartment in Calgary.
We had to book the apartment very short notice due to a cancelation we received.
This was not an issue and we are very grateful for the great Organisation.
The bed in the big bedroom is large and very comfortable.
The view from the apartment is just amazing.
We really enjoyed the stay and can only recommend.

Very organized and looked exactly like the pictures. The communication was very open and available ALOT of details and instructions. Overall great stay I would stay here again. Thanks for being great Hosts Jason and Chloe.

I stayed here for 5 nights a my Mom. Always a treat getting to spend time with her, and staying at Chloe and Jason‚Äôs for the bill perfectly.
There‚Äôs a lot going on in the neighborhood. Good restaurants and bars, real businesses, and other residential projects. I was able to walk to my morning meetings downtown in no time. 17th Street is also just a quick walk with more bars and restaurants and even a pharmacy.
The suite is generous and beautiful. It‚Äôs very well designed and the two balconies face South and East. This isn‚Äôt your typical condo project - you don‚Äôt have to leave your room to change your mind :)
Chloe and Jason made sure everything was taken care of and responded inside of 10 minutes and sometimes immediately. It was very reliable communication.
Plenty of pillows and comfortable bedding to melt into after marathon days.

I wanted to share my stay in this apartment. The apartment was fabulous. The booking went smooth. I give them 5/5 but I faced a scary experience with the building itself. They have two garages in the underground parking. The main one and there's another trap metal door the further you drive down. If you drive an SUV it will give a small height space. I drove through this trap door following another car infront of me with a reasonable allowance. I followed since I was close to the car and the door was fully open when I looked. As I was in the middle I heard a sound that was the metal door hitting the top of my Audi q7 shattering the top of my windshield. Thankfully I was not injured but my hope through this message is that people will be careful with the garage when they stay at this location.
Thanks,
Moira
What a great view!! We enjoyed this condo and super easy to get around downtown
Great place for the price! We enjoyed our stay and the views of both the mountains and the city skyline. Comfortable furniture as well.
The place is extremely beautiful, very clean and perfect location. The view is extraordinary and we are looking forward to come back. We strongly recomand it to others
We had a great time at this location. Everything was really close, and the view was unforgettable.

We had a great stay at this Airbnb! The host was super friendly and very responsive throughout our stay. The unit was clean, well-maintained, and comfortably fit five people. The check-in process was very clear and smooth, and overall, we‚Äôre really happy with our experience.
One suggestion for the host: the checkout instructions ask guests to pile up used towels, linens, and rags in the bedroom. While it‚Äôs understandable to help the cleaning staff identify used items, I‚Äôd personally prefer if the host‚Äôs team handled that entirely to avoid any hygiene issues‚Äîespecially since guests might accidentally forget something.
Also worth mentioning (as other reviews have noted), there are some homeless people around the neighborhood, but this didn‚Äôt affect our stay and is, of course, outside the host‚Äôs control.
Overall, we‚Äôd definitely recommend this place and would stay again!

We were honestly quite disappointed with our 2-night stay, mainly because of two things. First, when we arrived, the master bedroom wasn‚Äôt clean at all. the floor was still dirty, like it hadn‚Äôt even been swept. The towels also smelled bad and we had to wash them before using them. The sofa in the living room also had an unpleasant smell which made it uncomfortable to sit on.
Second, the TV wasn‚Äôt working the whole time we were there. We were told it was already having issues and still being fixed but we feel like it should have been sorted out before our check-in. We were told multiple times that someone would come by to fix it, so we waited the whole day but no one showed up. That was really frustrating.
We paid the full price expecting a relaxing stay, but instead, it ended up being stressful. Please make sure the place is fully cleaned and ready before guests arrive. The thing is, the unit itself is actually nice and the view is beautiful. It just needs be maintained well.

This property was exactly what I needed during my stay in Calgary: spacious, well-equipped, and ideally located.
While the check-in process may seem a bit tricky at first, the hosts have provided an incredibly detailed and clear PDF guide that makes everything smooth and straightforward. Once inside, the space far exceeded my expectations, with stunning views and thoughtful touches throughout.
It's worth noting that some of the surrounding area faces social challenges, which are beyond the hosts‚Äô control, just something to be aware of. That said, the secure parking and overall convenience of the location more than made up for it.
I genuinely appreciated the care and effort the hosts put into making this a great stay.
Thanks again, and hats off to the hosts for doing such a great job. Keep it up!
One of the Best building in Downtown area, the best view and location
Chloe and Jason were good hosts I‚Äôll visit again.

name: Condo in Calgary ¬∑ ‚òÖ4.74 ¬∑ 1 bedroom ¬∑ 1 bed ¬∑ 1 bath
description: Welcome to this beautifully designed one bed one bath condo located in the heart of downtown Calgary, where industrial style meets comfort and elegance. This stunning condo boasts incredible views of the city skyline, with the iconic Calgary Tower standing tall in the distance.The spaceAs you enter the condo, you'll be greeted by an open concept living space that seamlessly blends modern and industrial elements. Exposed and high concrete ceilings create a chic and edgy atmosphere that is softened by the warm, earthy tones of the furnishings.The living room is furnished with a comfortable sofa,  perfect for lounging and enjoying the stunning views of the city through the floor-to-ceiling windows. The sleek and modern kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, and all the essentials needed to cook a gourmet meal.The bedroom is a cozy retreat, featuring a plush queen-sized bed with luxurious linens and plenty of storage space in the built-in closet. The bathroom is stylishly designed with a deep bath tub, contemporary fixtures, and plenty of soft towels.This condo also features a private balcony, where you can sit back and relax while taking in the breathtaking views of the city. Other amenities include air conditioning, high-speed internet, and a smart TV for your entertainment needs.Located in the heart of downtown Calgary, this condo is just steps away from some of the city's best restaurants, bars, and shops. Whether you're here for work or play, this industrial-style condo offers the perfect combination of comfort, convenience, and style.Guest accessGuests will have access to the entire suite plus Sky lounge/ fitness facility and poolRegistration DetailsBL267402
reviews: Clean place , amazing view and easy check in. Was al perfect lititle spot for our trip. If I could have changed one thing it was I didn‚Äôt realizie that the undergoing parking was not included and I didn‚Äôt like leaving my car on the street.  Other then that everything was great

Booked this BnB for a nice quiet gateway. The room was not so clean, had debris and dirt over the floors. The view was the only outstanding part of the apartment. We hardly got any sleep in due to the party happening. The closest was pre-broken when we got to the bnb, definitely does not match the pictures. I wouldn‚Äôt book again if I was looking for comfort. I will definitely book for the view. The communication between the host was smooth.

I had a fantastic stay here. The location is amazing - clear views of the Calgary tower from all areas of the condo.
The unit was clean, and communication from the hosts was very warm and near instant throughout the experience, which took a lot of stress off of the trip.
Kudos to the team, I enjoyed my stay and will be back.
Thanks again!
Great place and in a great location. Would definitely stay again

Pros... there are many:
Best thing about this place is the full view of the city from both the lounge and the bedroom - I couldn't get enough of it!
Place is much as pictured, photos are glossier and make it seem a bit bigger/ brighter. It's still a beautiful place, even without the gloss.
Check in was simple and contactless.
Everything was clean
Appreciated the Tim Hortons coffee pods every morning :)
Nice Japanese restaurant/ bento place nearby, and a convenient walk/ ride to Stephen Avenue.
Bed was very comfy, and there's loads of storage space.
-Shower head - please replace asap as that one is unusable - used the bottom tap which was frustrating.
- Soap dispenser - pump did not work throughout my stay
- Some sockets in bedroom don't work
- Not a major issue for me, but bedroom closet door is broken and leans on a wall
-Communication was prompt, except near check-out; requested delayed check out and had to follow up next day. Declined, so had to leave sharpish!
Place was wonderful. Right in downtown Calgary with amazing views of the city. Place was clean and tidy. I would definitely comeback!!
Pool area was a little underwhelming. Barely got any sun amd was undersized- no one uses this space but it has potential

Overall great place, it is common for elevator maintenance and operation to fluctuate affecting lift times, but other than that the space was clean, ready on-time, and cozy in the evenings. The team was available via messages 24/7. Would stay here again!
Nice place. Location is great, good view, smooth check in.
Definitely will stay again! Apartment have perfect view from the balcony and we liked it so much!
Really nice place definitely gonna come again
It was pretty chill and easy to get to
Great views of the city!!
Good location, place has nice views and pretty spacious!
The place was in good shape, and had a great view!
Beautiful apartment looked just like the pictures with a great view. Check in process was easy and I would stay here again . The apartment was very clean as well.
Nice view

Good bars and restaurants within walking distance. Check-in and out was easy and uncomplicated. Great view from the balcony, especially in the evening. If you have any questions, they responded quickly.

A few things were downsides but overall 9/10
Amazing time, no complaints would stay again ‚ú®

location_details.value: 8 minute walk to the nearest LRT station to get you anywhere you need to be in the city. 10th avenue goes directly onto two major highways (Macleod trail and Crowchild Trail). 7 minute walk to 17th avenue, Calgary number one hotspot for bars, restaurants and nightlife.
